comment: First of all,  this 'whatever you want to call this time waster'  is so complicated and very user UNfriendly. Even if it was operable, can we say anal? What a hassle for little return. Cost benefit analysis deems this app A WASTE OF TIME. wow. Incredible waste. Uninstalling immediately

reply.author: PalasPro Sofware
reply.content:
Hi Jamie,
Thanks for taking the time to put this comment. We are sorry that your impression of the application is that you indicate. We are open to any suggestions for improvement.
Best regards
